name: The Last Hiker
description:
This is the story of Frank and his brother Charlie.

To reconnect with the nature, they go together on a hike in the mountains. They setup camp for the night, but on the next morning Charlie is missing.

Frank decides to go after him and discovers that the world has changed overnight!

In this adventure, you play Frank and face the zombie apocalypse in a forest- and mountain- themed environment.

Fight your way through brainless and brain-hungry zombies using melee weapons and guns Collect points, ammunitions and eat marshmallows on a stick to recover health Complete quests for unique rewards Explore 5 different levels Controls

You play with the keyboard and mouse.

Move: WASD (QWERTZ) or ZQSD (AZERTY)
Aim/Look: Mouse

Pick up: E
Reload: R
Change Weapon: 1, 2 and 3

Hit / Shoot: Left Click
Special: Right Click

Skip Dialogue: Space
Pause: ESC
Help: H

Requirements
  • 1.3GB of disk space
  • Minimum 4GB RAM and i5 (i7 recommended)
